items.sentence: Tom is supposed to be helping Mary right now.
Tom is still trying to figure out what to do.
Tom is still looking for a house he can rent.
Tom is looking for a solution to the problem.
Tom is looking for a place to live in Boston.
Tom is here because he wants to talk to Mary.
Tom is going to play handball this afternoon.
Tom is going to have to ask Mary to help him.
Tom is going to find out what has to be done.
Tom is getting married three months from now.
